.. This is your project CHANGES.txt file which will contain the release notes.
.. The content of this file, along with README.rst, will appear in your
.. project's PyPI page.

Changelog
=========


0.4 (2011-06-06)
----------------

- The project is hosted in bitbucked now. I had issues with hg-git plugin.
- Css link replace feature.


0.3 (2011-06-03)
----------------

- Support for several tools (yui compressor) using inout in minimizer
- Verbose mode
- Updated documentation: new link to github project


0.2 (2011-06-02)
----------------

- Replace command
- Multiple mimimizers


0.1 (2011-06-02)
----------------

- Initial release
